citations.narrative:
The pellet feed for the porcupines is being stored inside a metal trashcan. At the time of the inspection, there are
numerous small insects present inside the trashcan as well as the feed bag and in contact with the feed.
Inadequate food storage can lead to contamination of food by pests and impact the quality of the feed. Supplies of food
and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, molding, or
contamination by vermin.
To be corrected by 5/3/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The pellet feed for the porcupines is being stored inside a metal trashcan. At the time of the inspection, there are 
numerous small insects present inside the trashcan as well as the feed bag and in contact with the feed.  
Inadequate food storage can lead to contamination of food by pests and impact the quality of the feed. Supplies of food 
and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, molding, or 
contamination by vermin.  
To be corrected by 5/3/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
